about_the_game:
Zegelon: Hardcore Arena is a fast-paced competitive multiplayer survival game that offers a strategic battle royale hack & slash experience, where players compete in brutal gladiatorial combat for gold and glory, with no second chances.

Unique gameplay:

Enjoy a truly unique way of gaming by mixing central elements inspired from tabletop role-playing and card games with intense hack & slash gameplay. All set in the post-apocalyptic dark fantasy world of Zegelon, where death is permanent and victory glorious.

Variety of characters:

Combining character creation in the classic spirit of old school tabletop role-playing and card games with competitive multiplayer customisation and character progression that offers players a wide variety of characters to play and fight, for every game.

Solo or team:

Enter the game solo or team up with up to three comrades in intense 4v4 battles. Each match is a test of coordination, strategy, and mechanical skills, where teamwork can be as crucial as individual prowess.

Arenas of Zegelon:

Battle across the great arenas in what is left of the world of Zegelon, each arena with its own set of challenges and tactical considerations. Adapt your strategy to your surroundings to gain the upper hand and beware, there might be more than just other gladiators to end your life.

  • DirectX: Version 10
